Characters.name: Arthur
Characters.title: The Would Be King
Characters.description: Arthur is the illigetimate son of High King Uther. When Arthur's half brother, the prince, Mordred is killed in battle, Arthur is charged as being guardian over the land until his nephew, Mordred's son also named Mordred, is able to reign. This is a time when the Saxons are invading, trying to take over Britain. Arthur, the great war specialist that he is, leads his warriors to battle for the heart of Britain.

Characters.name: Derfel
Characters.title: Warrior
Characters.description: Our narrator, Derfel, now late in years, is a monk and has been asked by the young Queen Igraine to tell of his stories of Arthur. Derfel was once a warrior in trusted service to Arthur. These books are stories of the events as he remembers them.
